He was probably just tired or something, the guard reasoned, and walked away. In moments, the lights for the whole cell block shut down. Coach looked over his shoulder to make sure no guards were passing by his cell at the time, and seeing that there weren't any, grinned.

"Ha ha ha... Finally, after years of planning... I can finally get my revenge on the world... and on those meddlesome spies!" Coach ranted.

After he had been taken down by Clover, Sam and Alex at the Olympics years ago, his name had been disgraced (even though no one knew he real name and just called him Coach) and he had been sentenced to 10 years in a minimum security prison, not considered dangerous enough to be placed in a WHOOP high security facility. That alone was insulting- he'd created a swarm of body-altering robot bugs and he wasn't considered dangerous enough? Just another reason for his vengeance.

To be fair, it was hardly a rough life he'd been living- most of the guards and prisoners were actually rather pleasant, and due to under-population, was even given his own personal cell. All in all, with the free food, free board and plenty of spare time, it was a pretty good gig.

But Coach never forgot his humiliation at the hands of three teenage girls. His chance at glory, at immortality in the eyes of the world at the Winter Olympics, all dashed. So in the time he'd been imprisoned, Coach set up a plan for revenge. Cautiously, he stole as many electronics as he could get away with- guard's cell phones and walkie talkies, prison security systems, scrap goods from the prisoner workshop- to craft his masterpieces.

"Ultra bugs... power on!" Coach said. In the dark of his cell, three small robotic insects activated, tiny but powerful wings silently flapping and lifting the tiny wasp-like machines into the air. Coach could barely contain his glee; these new ultra bugs were exponentially more powerful than the ones he'd used years ago to cheat the the Olyimpics. Able to alter not just a person's body into whatever form he commanded with much greater effectiveness and power than a hundred of the old bugs, but also able to bend a person's mind to do his bidding, the ultra bugs were perfect to get his revenge on the spies.

"Alright, time to get some good old fashioned vengeance... You've got your programming: find the three spies, Sam, Clover and Alex, and get inside of them." Coach commanded, then began to talk to himself. "Just wait... soon I'll have a trio of brainwashed super bodyguards at my beck and call!
